attributes.action: Return the Higher tax rate to £40,000 or above
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government very sneakily introduced a new limit to when people pay the higher rate of tax at 40%, it is now set at £34,600 as opposed to the previous of £40,000, this now puts a lot more people who in todays financial climate are not high earners on the 40% tax payment bracket, this petition is to request that the governement return to the original rate or higher to stop penalising hard working average wage earners with a tax that was introduced for high earners. Another Stealth Tax!
